message.content: It is challenging to provide an accurate summary of the opinions of most women in Belgium on divorce as their perspectives may vary greatly depending on their personal experiences, beliefs, and cultural backgrounds. However, in Belgium, divorce is generally seen as a socially acceptable option for couples whose marriages have irretrievably broken down. Women, like men, may view divorce as a means to end an unhappy or unhealthy relationship, seek personal fulfillment, or prioritize their own well-being and that of their children. Many women in Belgium may also perceive divorce as an opportunity for personal growth, independence, and the chance to build a better future. It is crucial to note that while individual opinions may differ, the prevalence of divorce in Belgian society suggests that a significant number of women find it a viable option for ending unsatisfactory marriages.
